projects.author: Jasper Precht
projects.title: Digit of your Widget
projects.abstract: What items do you possess and what are their functions, which in turn may lead to the reason to possess them? Help me to find out!

projects.author: Kevin Schiffer
projects.title: The Aesthetics of National Flags
projects.abstract: Flags are symbolic visual systems that are often designed based on a nations history and origins and not necessarily on aesthetics. Visual as they are, they often - intended or unintended - create specific sentiments to the viewer. Being the most important visual representation of a state, I want to examine what flags are perceived especially beneficial or unfavorable for its state when viewed by others.

projects.author: Tino Kanigs
projects.title: ESCAPE
projects.abstract: Can you reach the top? Play the flash-game ESCAPE and try to climb as far as possible. You only need one button to play it.

projects.author: Oskar Suslow
projects.title: Let's talk about beer
projects.abstract: It started with a simple brewing process and thousands of years later we're still drinking it. The thing we talk about is beer. Some people love it, others don't. What about you?

projects.author: Isabell Herzog
projects.title: Good Morning, Flat Design!
projects.abstract: It came, minimized and won. Criticism, refusal, backbiting - they did not exist. The arrival of the new design movement has been received with enthusiasm. We need to get to the  bottom of this phenomenon. Please help me and set a check mark for a good purpose.

projects.author: Jolanta Paliszewska
projects.title: Vegan oder vegetarisch - der neue Ernährungstrend
projects.abstract: Ist Vegetarische/ vegan Ernährung schon längst keine Randerscheinung mehr?

projects.author: Emil Woop
projects.title: TRANSIT
projects.abstract: Is it normal to spend 2 hours every day to get to your place of work? This Project aims to answer just that and more - with your help!

projects.author: Hong Loan Phan
projects.title: Childhood Heroes
projects.abstract: Remember when you were a little child? What kind of TV Shows did you watch? Probably most of you have watched at least one cartoon show or have read a comic book! Tell me a little about your childhood memories of  your past hero!

projects.author: Felix Harle
projects.title: Gestalt Images — Optical Illusions
projects.abstract: Gestalt Images are optical illusions that can be interpreted and perceived in two different ways. The following brief survey presents some of these images and aims to identify which 'Gestalt' is commonly seen first by participants.

projects.author: Fabian Schultz
projects.title: 10 Questions on Media Consumption
projects.abstract: Everybody consumes, uses and sees media in a different way. This survey rises ten related questions and will be a foundation for a student project at the University of Applied Sciences in Potsdam, Germany.

projects.author: Lilli Tischer
projects.title: One Step
projects.abstract: Hi there! I would like to invite you to think about your moving options! Just take a few minutes and reflect on your next step!

projects.author: Christian Muench
projects.title: urbanNexus
projects.abstract: urbanNexus experiments with visualizing an individual with geodata. Each person has locations that are important to them. All of these locations tell us something about the person they portray and create room for interpretation.
